# ceph_cluster (Data Source)

Data source for Ceph cluster information.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "ceph_cluster" "example" {}

output "cluster_fsid" {
  value = data.ceph_cluster.example.fsid
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `fsid` (String) The unique identifier (FSID) of the Ceph cluster.
